Motherload and the other Airtankers had been warned of Grimlock coming
to O=
lympus. Visibly, things had been moving there, as they were all
wearing wha=
t seemed to be a crown.

Motherload: Ha! There is the Maximal fool! Why hav=
e you come to
Olympus? Why shouldn't we have you executed for high insolenc=
e to our
Imperial Delegation [She waved her arms at the other of her grinni=
ng
Airtanker colleagues.]?

-- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <ro=
borick007@...> wrote:
>

his face.

numbers mean?

which locks in an automated landing sequence that follows the=
 quordinates.

e shuttle hatch
opens and Grimlock steps out in his T-Rex mode.

rimlock: Me, Grimlock, here. Where Motherload?

wrote:

> Tech: Jotunn se=
nt him to speak with Motherload? What the slag is he
> talking about? Hmph.=
... Probably one of those bigshot case anyways...
> [He turns on the comm a=
gain.] Transport, this is Olympus Complex.
> Follow the flight coordinates =
I'm sending. I hope you enjoy your stay.
> [He closes the comm.] I hope it'=
s a short stay... Who'd like to have
> Grimlock around for long anyhow?
